title: How to make the most of UPI for your daily expenses
description: UPI, introduced by NPCI, transformed how transactions are conducted in India. It facilitates instant money transfers through mobile devices, ensuring convenience and security. Users can link multiple bank accounts and make various payments, such as bills, groceries, and dining, with ease. The article provides detailed insights into making the most of UPI services.
